title: Geoffrey Hilton
text:
I am an incoming PhD student in economics at HEC Lausanne. My research interests are in political economy, game theory, and information.

Education
University of Lausanne | Lausanne, Switzerland
PhD in Economics | Beginning Sept 2023
IHEID | Geneva, Switzerland
MA in International Economics | 2021 - 2023
CUHK-Shenzhen | Shenzhen, China
BBA in Applied Economics | 2017 - 2021

Mathematics

Dover Publications reprints high quality math textbooks and sells them at extremely competitive prices. They are often available on Amazon.
Jay Cummings has written and published two excellent textbooks on Proofs and Real Analysis that he sells at cost.
